This R tutorial is broken down into three parts:

- [**R Basics**](r-intro.qmd) – Covers the basics of R, including data types, functions, and basic operations.
- [**Data Manipulation**](r-tidydata.qmd) – Introduces data manipulation and cleaning using the `dplyr` and `tidyr` packages, including filtering, selecting, and summarizing data.
- [**Data Visualization**](r-plotting.qmd) – Covers data visualization using the `ggplot2` package, including creating basic plots and customizing them.
